articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Bonds stung, dollar cheered by sudden hawkish turn at Fed - CNA
articles.description: SYDNEY:     Asian markets looked set for a rough ride on Thursday after the U.S. Federal Reserve stunned investors by signalling it might raise interest rates at a much faster pace than assumed, sending yields and the dollar sharply higher.

articles.title: Can Japan counter China’s vaccine diplomacy with Southeast Asia donations? - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Wednesday’s shipment of 1 million Covid-19 vaccine doses to Vietnam will be followed by donations to Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Thailand next month, Tokyo has said.
